name: Mutants Invasion
description:
Mutants Invasion is a 3D adventure FPS game in which you have to break through hordes of mutants and find a nuclear bomb before the mutants destroy the entire world. You are one of a squad of fighters who decided to go to a city overrun by zombies. Explore various locations, including an abandoned city, and do everything to avoid being eaten by mutants!

Peculiarities:
- Play a short campaign in single player mode.
- Explore a new world.
- Embark on an exciting journey!
